mapper.select: SELECT a.uuid, a.`name`, a.type, a.`color`, a.`project_uuid` AS projectUuid, a.`process_area_uuid` AS processAreaUuid, b.`transfer_to` AS transferTo FROM `rdm_project_status` a LEFT JOIN `rdm_project_status_route` b ON a.`uuid` = b.`uuid` WHERE a.`project_uuid` = #{projectUuid} AND a.`process_area_uuid` = #{processAreaUuid}

SELECT b.`transfer_to` AS uuid, c.name, c.type FROM `rdm_project_status` a JOIN `rdm_project_status_route` b ON a.`uuid` = b.uuid LEFT JOIN rdm_project_status c ON b.`transfer_to` = c.uuid WHERE a.`project_uuid` = #{projectUuid} AND a.`process_area_uuid` = #{processAreaUuid} AND a.`uuid` = #{statusUuid}

SELECT a.uuid, a.`name`, a.type, a.`project_uuid` AS projectUuid, a.`process_area_uuid` AS processAreaUuid, a.`color` FROM `rdm_project_status` a WHERE a.`project_uuid` = #{projectUuid} AND a.`process_area_uuid` = #{processAreaUuid} AND a.uuid = #{uuid}
